name: Steel Rampart
description:
Steel Rampart (Steel Rampart) is a 2D game in which players need to control machine guns to defend themselves against incoming enemies, including planes and tanks. Players can purchase defensive devices and upgrades to strengthen their defenses and make their steel fortress even more impenetrable. The number of enemies in the game is increasing, and players need to concentrate and react quickly to deal with different attack methods and make themselves survive longer. Come and challenge your marksmanship and strategy!

Game Features:

Intense shooting experience: Players can use machine guns to defend against incoming enemies, including planes and tanks. Each wave of enemies has different attack methods, requiring players to adjust their defense strategies in time.

Free upgrade system: Players can purchase different defense devices and upgrades, such as mines and rockets, to enhance their defense capabilities. Different upgrades can make the player's steel fortress stronger.

Exquisite picture and sound effects: The pictures and sound effects in the game are very exquisite, allowing players to experience the real shooting experience.
